About
  • Dec 5, 2021 Scaling transaction throughput in blockains
    Exploring blockchain scalability solutions across Parallel PoW Blockchains, PoS Protocols, and Layer 2 Protocols. Parallel PoW enhances throughput via multiple blockchains, PoS focuses on stake-based incentives with security concerns, and Layer 2 solutions offer scalability with unique trust models. These methods reflect ongoing efforts to improve blockchain transaction capacity.
